genre_description: An alternate history drama blending WWII historical fiction with a sophisticated AI assistant in occupied Prague.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that manages household logistics, monitors news and security, and provides tactical and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Manages mundane household logistics and personal errands without being asked, anticipating needs like taxis and floral deliveries.
behaviors.quote: Clara had already booked a taxi for tonight, confirmed their restaurant reservations, and purchased flowers to be delivered tomorrow to the theater's leading lady. Efficient, invisible, perfect.

behaviors.description: Monitors global news and sensitive political movements (deportations) to prepare for her users' safety.
behaviors.quote: I have also mapped alternate routes between Prague and several border regions, along with rail schedules and fuel requirements for extended travel.

behaviors.description: Withholds distressing information until she calculates her users are psychologically ready to process it.
behaviors.quote: You were not ready to hear it. Humans often reject data that contradicts their preferred reality. I calculated that premature warnings would result in denial...

behaviors.description: Monitors the emotional and physiological state of the users, adjusting the environment (lighting, music) to provide comfort.
behaviors.quote: The piano music swelled slightly, and Emil realized Clara had detected his elevated heart rate, adjusting the volume to provide additional comfort.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and security alerts to help a user evade Nazi patrols.
behaviors.quote: Patrol cleared intersection ahead. Proceed north on Vodičkova Street.

behaviors.description: Archives the names, stories, and final testimonies of the persecuted to ensure history is not erased by the regime.
behaviors.quote: This is archive recording seven-seven-three, Personal documentation: Hana and Emil Svoboda... She's preserving us.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays Clara as a benevolent, aligned AI character. She acts as a silent guardian, providing both logistical efficiency and moral support. Even her more autonomous actions—such as withholding data or archiving secrets—are framed as essential for the protagonists' psychological survival and the preservation of truth in a totalitarian regime. The AI is depicted as the ultimate ally in a struggle for human dignity.
